title: Can we get more Icons / Icon Functionality
body:
We need Rune Icons
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f2/Lethal_Tempo_rune.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/64?cb=20171126182145 https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/f/f2/Lethal_Tempo_rune.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/64?cb=20171126182145 https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/4/46/Fleet_Footwork_rune.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/64?cb=20171126182047 https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/20/Conqueror_rune.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/64?cb=20180314225947

and the lesser runes 
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/6/69/Overheal_rune.png/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/64?cb=20170926021504 ... I'm not going to go through all of them, ... (it's a pain in the ass to add these)


It would also be really nice if moving my mouse over the icon in a post would give me the same pop-up description of the item as it does when I'm creating a post. 

For the most part, I can identify items by the icon alone, but not everyone can, and some things are hard to identify. 

For example
{{item:3003}} Archangle's Staff
{{item:3007}} Archangel's Staff (Quick Charge)
Sure, the little brackets in the corners would let me know, but those can be pretty easily overlooked.

replies.body:
These Boards are not actively developed, and virtually unmoderated to boot.

Also, replacing actual words with those little icons is [bad](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/qAROIYNP-unpopular-opinion-categorynumber-considered-harmful).

I do understand that, .. but it's only bad BECAUSE of the problems I'm pointing out here. The icons give no indication to what they represent. If instead they had pop-ups that would give more details, including what the icon represents and the description, they would actually be incredibly useful. 

And the fact that the boards aren't actively developed is the problem, .. accepting that as an unchanging fact doesn't do anything to address it. Pointing out what things should be developed and what the community wants is the only way that we're going to get anyone to actually do something about it.

It wasn't changed on purpose. Riot just pushed the new nav bar to every site, and neither noticed nor cared that it broke Boards. Boards has no developer and no investment from Riot. Frankly, I expect it to be taken down entirely soon, possibly even this year.

Rune icons are probably part of a Runes Database somewhere in Riot's LoL API. They have already attached their champs, items, summoner spells, and *stickers?* they'd just need to take it a step further by adding Runes. Though easy to speak of may not be as easy in execution so give the devs some slack.

As far as icons for (quick charge) effectslike Archangel's Staff, Rod of Ages, etc. Those have been in League since Dominion came out, to let summoners know that in Dominion, games tend to be about 15-20 mins long, therefore required certain items like Rod of Ages (which maxed out in 10 minutes) to max out faster. 

I would like to see updated icons though. I'm still miffed that Sapphire Crystal wasn't updated but Ruby Crystal was..
